name: json-power-query
description: A simpler version of a json querying mechanism.
author: Jesse Daniel Mitchell

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rollup index.js --file dist/cjs/index.js --format cjs --exports named && rollup index.js --file dist/esm/index.js --format esm && echo { "type": "module" } > dist/esm/package.json && echo { "type": "commonjs" } > dist/cjs/package.json && cd dist && standard --fix */*.js
